Introduction

Mei is a Japanese dancer and singer under iNKODE. She is a member of the girl group SAY MY NAME.

She originally gained fame for joining HYBE x Geffen Records' survival show “The Debut: Dream Academy“, where she was eliminated after ranking 15th place.

Mei made her debut with SAY MY NAME on October 16, 2024 with the release of their first mini album "SAY MY NAME".
